detail_desc: Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

One-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood and a zip down the front. Lined.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Metal rings in various designs.
Ankle boots in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and detachable, adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline and a gathered seam at the top, a concealed zip in one side and short puff sleeves that are elasticated at the shoulders and hems. Partly lined.

Short dress in an airy weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip and an opening at the back and a covered button at the back of the neck. Long, raglan puff sleeves that are voluminous at the top and taper from the elbows down. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Boxy, oversized jacket in a wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front and large chest pockets with a flap and button. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Sandals in canvas with wedge heels covered in braided jute. Foot strap at the front and ties around the ankle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 12 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a lined drawstring hood. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long metal earrings. Length 6.5 cm.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with flutter sleeves and buttons at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Soft cotton lining at the top.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in slightly stretchy narrow-wale corduroy with elastication at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in jersey.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motifs front and back.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Treggings in superstretch twill with a slight sheen. Concealed hook-and-eye fastening, a zip fly and fake back pockets.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a scalloped grandad collar and buttons at the top with a scalloped button band. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side and flared skirt. Unlined.
Flip-flops in imitation leather with square toes and heels. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Fitted jumper in soft, rib-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar and extra-long sleeves.

Multiway push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Detachable shoulder straps and a detachable, adjustable strap at the back. The bra can be worn as a halterneck bra, with the straps crossed over at the back or with the straps crossed at the back and wound round the body.
Knee-length, pleated dress with a rounded neckline, opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Shirt in cotton twill with a print motif. Collar, pearly press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist, wide waist panel and open pocket on one leg.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
A-line skirt in washed cotton denim with buttons down the front and vertical seams.
Short skirt in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and a pattern made from plastic-studs on the front.
Boots with pointed toes, covered heels and soft, thigh-high shafts. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.

Strapless, push-up balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in soft silk with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes and a decorative strap at the front.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short dress in a soft patterned weave with a lace trim around the neckline and opening with twisted ties at the top. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit.
Fitted, turtleneck jumper in a fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Long sleeves with beaded appliqués on the shoulders.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, patch front pockets, shoulder pads, and a pleat at the back. Lined.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, and side pockets. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Marled sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Seamless.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar and half-length button placket with a classic front. Yoke at the back and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.
Knee-length dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and short dolman sleeves. Lined.
Slippers in velour with a reversible-sequin motif on the front and a loop at the back. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Mittens in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative bows on the front.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
Shopper in braided paper straw with a fringed top edge and two handles at the top. Lined. Depth 16 cm. Height approx. 26 cm. Width approx. 30 cm.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Top in a soft, loose knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and double, flounced sleeves.
Mules in grained imitation leather with wide crossover straps at the front and a decorative metal ring on top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a text print on the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Chokers in diffrent styles, one in velvet and two in lace. Metal fasteners. Adjustable length, approx. 30.5-38 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and gathers at the top. Loose fit with a rounded hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, heart-shaped front pockets, regular back pockets and narrow hems.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.

Waist bag in sturdy polyurethane with a matt finish. Taped zip with a metal carabiner hook at the front, a zipped outer compartment at the back and two inner compartments. Lined. Adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Size 6x17x30 cm.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
